name: The Devil's Dice
description:
Are you bold enough to challenge the devil in a game of jeopardy and dice? Pull the lever, spin the wheel, try your luck against this mechanical brain. Can you shut out the devil?

This two-player game is based on the folk game, "Pig" — played with a single die. You can choose to either play against the machine, or play against another player.

Beautiful artwork (supports the Retina display) and fun sounds. Easy for anyone to learn.

Now with Game Center achievements and support for iPhone 5.
